column5: Any one know where I can get the bottom of a boat Welding done in Hamilton area.. seems where the boat was welded before the weld has let go and my friends boat is leaking there about a 3" split
3" wide or long.  Might be a sign of bigger things to come.
3" wide or long.  Might be a sign of bigger things to come. no just 3"  long... looks like old weld was not done correctly should have weld and patch l believe but l am not a welder

There's a welding school on upper Wellington that might be able to fix it.  http://advancedwelding.ca/home/  Also Mohawk college stoney Creek campus has a full welding shop and the one teacher Chris is an artist when it comes to welding, might be worth a call
There's a boat welding guru out here on Hwy #3 and Sandusk Rd. South of Hagersville if you don't find one closer to Hamilton.
